thread.title: Trump pulls U.S. out of Iran nuclear deal

title: Trump pulls U.S. out of Iran nuclear deal
text:
Trump pulls U.S. out of Iran nuclear deal 3:15pm EDT - 02:13
President Donald Trump on Tuesday pulled the United States out of an international agreement aimed at stopping Iran from obtaining a nuclear bomb, and said he would reimpose economic sanctions on Tehran immediately. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
President Donald Trump on Tuesday pulled the United States out of an international agreement aimed at stopping Iran from obtaining a nuclear bomb, and said he would reimpose economic sanctions on Tehran immediately.
